description: This file contains test cases for the UrlKnowledge class, including synchronous and asynchronous tests for loading URLs into a knowledge base, verifying database interactions, and ensuring correct behavior with empty or invalid URLs.

methods.name: setup_vector_db
methods.description: Fixture to set up a temporary LanceDb instance for testing, generating a unique table name and cleaning up after tests.

methods.name: test_url_knowledge_base_directory
methods.description: Tests loading multiple URLs into the knowledge base and querying it via the Agent.

methods.name: test_url_knowledge_base_single_url
methods.description: Tests loading a single URL into the knowledge base and querying it.

methods.name: test_url_knowledge_base_async_directory
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading multiple URLs and querying the knowledge base.

methods.name: test_url_knowledge_base_async_single_url
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading a single URL and querying the knowledge base.

methods.name: test_url_knowledge_base_empty_urls
methods.description: Tests behavior when loading an empty list of URLs.

methods.name: test_url_knowledge_base_invalid_url
methods.description: Tests behavior when loading an invalid URL, ensuring the database remains empty.
